title: QOMP
description: 3D video game that generalizes the classic game Pong adding new features.

title: Robotman
description: Robot simulation with manipulator robot to perform a brain surgery.

title: Football team detection
description: Implementation of an algorithm for the recognition of football teams in images.

title: E-shop
description: Simulation of an intelligent distributed application that manages the purchase and sale of an electronic store.
info: Distributed application, Agent-oriented programming, Semantic Web

title: TreeKEA
description: Implementation of logics to distribute products from a store.

title: Compressor
description: Desktop application based on compressing and decompressing files where the following algorithms were applied: LZ78, LZW, LZSS and JPEG.

title: Hacker News
description: Implementation of use cases of the HN system: login, contribution with comments and replies, voting, etc.
